lead_paragraph: Nearly invisible, a modest, annually updated paperback, ''California Wine Winners,'' has showcased gold nuggets of data on some of America's best wine buys for 18 years. The 232-page 2001 ''Wine Winners'' includes, as the subtitle declares, ''The Best of the 2000 Judgings.'' For $9.95 you get a compilation of 2,628 low- and upscale-priced California wines that won special or double gold, gold, silver and bronze medals in major California contests: the Los Angeles and Orange County Fairs, Riverside International, San Francisco International, West Coast Wine Competition, California State Fair, New World International, Pacific Rim International and San Diego Competition.
abstract: Comment on guidebook California Wine Winners, annually updated paperback; photo (S)
